title: Personal AI
description: Personal.ai is on a mission to revolutionize human connection with our AI-first messaging platform. Our models are unique to and owned by each user. They can absorb massive amounts of unstructured user data, learn through basic chat, and create structured, time-bound memory stacks – a private vault of your digital mind. These stacks allow you to seamlessly recall experiences by asking questions, drafting personal responses, and more. Stay tuned.
